title: ONEANIA server. Be careful with "Liar"

embed.description: Create & discover new Champion builds/strategies, check your Summoner statistics and try our powerful LoL charts.

body:
Player with ID: Nick33345 form server Oceania is a liar. He always lie new player to lake their RP. He lie to new player to make them got a  deal with him "mystery gift for mystery gift", he will try to recieved the gift first, and then log out or unfriend with that poor players. So please guys, be careful with him!!

There are his information and some of the "lie-chatting" to take other RP
Hope you guys not got that problems and Riot plz let him get a punish for what he did ( i still have some "lie-chat" of him with other)

replies.body: Do not post information about other summoners here telling us to get them banned. It's against the rules. Make a support ticket about this and delete this thread.
